system.description: Your hand becomes coated with rust-colored acid. You can touch one nonmagical ferrous object (or one 5-foot cube of ferrous material) and cause it to rust and corrode. The object is destroyed. You can instead touch a ferrous creature to deal 3d6 points of damage +1 per caster level (max +15) per round. Magical armor and weapons, and creatures in metal armor, get a Reflex save each round.
system.target: One nonmagical ferrous object or one 5-ft. cube of ferrous material or one ferrous creature
